programme.title: S.W.A.T. SEASON 8
programme.desc: Inspired by the television series and the feature film, S.W.A.T. stars Shemar Moore as a locally born and raised S.W.A.T. sergeant newly tasked to run a specialized tactical unit that is the last stop in law enforcement in Los Angeles.

programme.title: TAIWAN PROFESSIONAL BASKETBALL LEAGUE
programme.desc: The Taiwan Professional Basketball League TPBL is Taiwans premier professional basketball league, bringing elite players, passionate fans, and worldclass entertainment to create an electrifying basketball experience. Featuring seven dynamic teamsTaipei Mars, New Taipei Kings, New Taipei CTBC DEA, Taoyuan Taiwan Beer Leopards, Hsinchu Toplus Lioneers, Formosa Dreamers, and Kaohsiung AquasTPBL showcases highintensity competition and unforgettable moments on the court. With a commitment to excellence, innovation, and fan engagement, TPBL is shaping the future of professional basketball in Asia and inspiring the next generation of athletes.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer
programme.desc: Scientists are developing powerful magnets to enable clean energy sources like fusion. But Chinas dominance of the supply chain for rareearth magnets threatens their global availability.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer
programme.desc: We explore the world of biocomputingwhere scientists are laying the foundation for a field that may blur the lines between the biological and synthetic.

programme.title: Bloomberg Next Africa
programme.desc: A monthly deep dive into Africas biggest stories through a Bloomberg lens, discussing key steps taken to help deliver on Africas quest of bridging the gap with global powers.

programme.title: Latitude
programme.desc: Power, Money, Culture. Haslinda Amin tells the story of Asias rise through the people helping to shape it.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Ryan. Kaji. Ryan Kaji is the king of toy videos, and one of YouTubes highest paid social media stars. Emily Chang meets Ryan and his parents in Los Angeles at the set of his new movie.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: How Youtube Became Must Watch TV. Emily Chang speaks with YouTube CEO Neal Mohan about the creator economy, staying atop the AI wave and transforming the platform into the worlds biggest streamer.

programme.title: The Deal with Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly
programme.desc: Ted Leonsis. Alex and Jason talk with Ted Leonsis, the founder of Monumental Sports & Entertainment, about how winning sports teams can help turn Washington into a super city.

programme.title: Unikitty
programme.desc: Unikitty and the gang tell spooky, scary and silly stories during their Halloween party.

programme.title: Mechamato
programme.desc: Amato and Pian plan to go into the Mechanizer to see the new town the Cone Konchos have built, but things go wrong when Bula and Bili accidentally join them.

programme.title: Mr Bean The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is asked to wear a sheep costume to help advertise Irmas knitwear stall, but he gets stuck in it!

programme.title: Tom And Jerry
programme.desc: Tom & Jerry zip along Singapores vibrant riverside and make a new friend Merli! Will Merli succeed in being the maestro of peace between the two?

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings World Tour
programme.desc: Grizzy has adopted a lamb and wants to educate him properly. The Lemmings want to play leapfrog with him!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After failing to capture Lamput with their gadgets, the Docs turn to magic. They buy a magic marker that can give them any superpower they draw on their skin.

programme.title: We Baby Bears
programme.desc: The Bears find a mysterious crayon that has the power to make anything they draw become REAL.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: When Grizz comes home with a live crab, he thinks it can become a pet for the brothers to share. However, after the crab pinches Ice Bears ear and wont let go, Panda and Grizz have to get their injured brother to the hospital, and fast!

programme.title: Jellystone!
programme.desc: Shag hires a bunch of detectives to find his lost sense of childhood wonder.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: The Justice League holds a talent competition to find a superhero worthy of joining the team.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Tweety Bird is going to the Grand Canyon, and Sylvester is going after Tweety. Elmer Fudd wants to play golf, too bad Daffy wants to be his caddy.

programme.title: Steven Universe The Movie
programme.desc: After so many harrowing adventures, Steven and the Gems are ready to celebrate how far theyve come with a movie musical! Little do they know theyre about to face their worst enemy yet.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings World Tour
programme.desc: There is only one carrot left in the house but Grizzy and the Lemmings all need it for different reasons.

programme.title: Jellystone!
programme.desc: Huck creates a fake opponent to run against him in the mayoral election.

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: MacBarm is bringing his chickens a new trough full of feed, that is until it falls out of his truck and breaks. Grandma and her twin sister return to Treetop Woods to recreate their old zipline act.

programme.title: Jessicas Big Little World
programme.desc: Jessica goes in the big kid part of the playground for the first time, and befriends Stanleigh.

programme.title: Tangranimals
programme.desc: Its night in the middle of the day. And very cold. In fact, Bao & Bao are freezing! Our friends must get to the bottom of this strange phenomenon, ASAP!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired to build a festive course for the Fall foot race. Wile E. Coyote is determined to beat the Road Runner with his RoboRunner despite its malfunctions.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.title: Builder Brothers Dream Factory
programme.desc: When their young neighbour CeCe comes over to visit, Drew and Jonathan share the story of how the Dream Factory came to be.

programme.title: Mumfie
programme.desc: When all the islanders are gathered for a celebration, Pinkey gives Mumfie a very strange hat. Mumfie is too embarrassed to put it on and tries to forget it until he realizes that, out of friendship, he ought to wear the bizarre headgear.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and causes her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A master jewel thief turns over a new leaf as a professional singer in a nightclub. However, a series of robberies happened shortly after and he becomes the suspect again. The thief then sets up a trap to snare the copycat but will this backfire on him?

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fangs fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: 2018 Drama Special
programme.desc:
Forget the existing oneact dramas! Short but impactive! KBS Drama Special presents high quality single episode dramas.
Dramas are the broadcast content with the widest public appeal.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Today is Georges birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pigs garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It is Sports Day at Peppas playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the tug of war. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that its not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing!The two friends search for the missing ropes turns out to be more difficult than they had imagined!

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Chef is so focused on his avocados perfect ripeness that he ignores the rest of his avocado sushi recipe. Chefs friend inspires him to bring Hawaii home by making poi and decorating the Stumpstaycation style.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Zeg is out smashing things with Blaze and AJ when he finds a tiny dinosaur egg. Now the three friends must embark on an epic journey across a prehistoric landscape to return the egg to its Truckodactyl mother.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When a bunch of adorable critters called Boingies get lost in Axle City, its up to Blaze and AJ to gather them up and get them home safe and sound.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Wally the Walrus searches all over Adventure Bay for Capn Turbot and turns the town upsidedown in the process. Everybody loves Helga Humdingers Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous and steal them all.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Rubble & Wild rescue animals from a giant runaway ball of yarn. Skye and Rory rescue a painter hanging from a scaffold. Marshall & Leo rescue animals stuck on a Ferris Wheel. Everest and Shade rescue a baby mountain goat stuck in a crevasse.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Its a double daring mid air rescue as Mayor Goodways first flying lesson goes sideways, the Pups make sure everyone lands safely.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Mix and Motors favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Now that Freds leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harms way...no matter what! Patricks lemonade stand isnt doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more! SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients, but Plankton is following their every step.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party! After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Danger Force and Captain Man go undercover as bad guys at The Beatin Dungeon to catch a criminal. If their cover is blown, theyll have to fight all of Swellviews toughest villains at once.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: With an invitation to Swellviews most exclusive restaurant, Henry decides to bring his boss, Ray, but finds it more complicated than expected.

programme.title: The Thundermans Undercover
programme.desc: After a training accident causes a glitch in Chloes powers, Max and Phoebe look for a cure. After Max thinks hes solved the issue, he allows Chloe to attend a party with friends, but his treatment creates brand new powers Chloe cant control.

programme.desc: Its parent teacher conference night and the Loud parents find themselves endlessly running around from class to class. Lincoln has his heart set on the Banana Split that their parents have promised if the Loud kids get more good reviews than bad.
